oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sky line view of Nashville, Tenn., 1944
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the Nashville city skyline showing the business district in 1944. Residential homes are pictured in the foreground. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Capital City; Downtown Nashville; Architecture; Buildings; Business; Postcards--Tennessee--Nashville; Business enterprises--Tennessee--Nashville; Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Architecture--Tennessee--Nashville; Lost architecture--Tennessee--Nashville; Central business districts--Tennessee--Nashville; Office buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Skyscrapers--Tennessee--Nashville; Dwellings--Tennessee--Nashville; Business districts--Tennessee--Nashville; Homes--Tennessee--Nashville; Cityscapes
